attributes.action: Introduce a direct fat tax, which penalises those whom are clinically obese.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would directly tax those whom are greedy enough to have a BMI of 30 or over. We propose a tax of £500 per point above 30. This would reduce financial strain on the NHS caused by people with eyes, "bigger than their bellies".

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
